name: Adnan Ozsoy
content: Adnan Ozsoy's Homepage Home Research Publications Education Teaching Adnan Ozsoy CV (pdf) Contact Information: E-mail: aozsoy{at}cs{dot}hacettepe{dot}edu{dot}tr Mailing address: Hacettepe Üniversitesi Bilgisayar Mühendisliği Bölümü Beytepe Kampüsü 06800 ANKARA / TÜRKİYE I received my Ph.D. degree from School of Informatics and Computing of Indiana University — Bloomington in 2014. I did my M.Sc. degree in Computer Science from University of Texas at Austin in 2007, and my B.Sc. degree from Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in 2005. My research interests include parallel programming, high performance computing with GPUs, string matching algorithms, big data problems, distributed systems, application parallelism, blockchain applications and cryptocurrencies. For more information about my research check Blockchain Lab @ Hacettepe and HPC Lab @ Hacettepe .
